SELECT t1. HOUR HOUR, COUNT(t2. HOUR) count FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( @cdate := DATE_ADD(@cdate, INTERVAL - 1 HOUR), '%y-%m-%d %H' ) HOUR FROM ( SELECT @cdate := DATE_ADD( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d %H'), INTERVAL + 1 HOUR ) FROM cities ) t0 LIMIT 24 ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(putInTime, '%y-%m-%d %H') HOUR FROM p_package WHERE putInTime >= (NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR) and station=#{stationId} ) t2 ON t1. HOUR = t2. HOUR GROUP BY t1. HOUR ORDER BY t1. HOUR;

SELECT t1. HOUR HOUR, COUNT(t2. HOUR) count FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT( @cdate := DATE_ADD(@cdate, INTERVAL - 1 HOUR), '%y-%m-%d %H' ) HOUR FROM ( SELECT @cdate := DATE_ADD( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y-%m-%d %H'), INTERVAL + 1 HOUR ) FROM cities ) t0 LIMIT 24 ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(p.curDate, '%y-%m-%d %H') HOUR FROM package_out_log p, package_in_log q WHERE p.curDate >= (NOW() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR) and q.station=#{stationId} and q.packId=p.packId ) t2 ON t1.
